annotations:
Good day! Ladies and Gentlemen,please propose for the below:(cement, clinker non prefer) Can consider VOY, TCT, PERIOD  aa. mv Jetstream 34,562MT 2012 4X35MT CR  open 21-22 AUG DAMMAM, SAUDIAN ARABIA .bb. mv DD Victory 26,482MT 2008 4X30MT CR+GRAB open 25 AUG CAMPHA VIETNAM.      aa. MV JETSTREAM, DESCRIBED AS BELOW FLAG:  MALTA PORT OF REGISTRY:  VALLETTA BUILT:    JUNE 2012 BUILDER:   SPP SHIPBUILDING CO.,LTD., KOREA OFFICIAL NO.: 9528184 IMO NO.:   9528184 MMSI NO.:  229 047 000 CALL SIGN:  9HA3024 TYPE OF VESSEL:    SINGLE DECK BULK CARRIER CLASSIFICATION SOCIETY: KOREAN REGISTER OF SHIPPING DWT: 34,562.7 MT AT S.L.W.L. 9.9165M (SUMMER LOAD DRAFT), TPC: 48.9MT LOA/LBP/BREADTH/DEPTH (M): 180.00/172.93/30.00/14.70  GRT/NRT: 23458/11578  HOLDS/HATCHES: 5/5 TTL CAPACITY (GRAIN INCL. HATCH COAMINGS): 48.700 CBM 5 HOLDS TANK TOP DIMENSIONS (LM X WM X HM):  NO.1 24,80 X 8,40(FWD)/19,80(AFT) X 13,10(UPPER DECK)/15,10(HATCH COVER) NO.2 24,80 X 20,70(FWD)/22,00(AFT) X 13,10(UPPER DECK)/15,10(HATCH COVER) NO.3 24,80 X 22,00 X 13,10(UPPER DECK)/15,10(HATCH COVER) NO.4 24,80 X 22,00 X 13,10(UPPER DECK)/15,10(HATCH COVER) NO.5 25,60 X 22,00(FWD)/12,80(AFT) X 13,10(UPPER DECK)/15,10(HATCH COVER) ALL CARGO HOLDS EQUIPPED WITH MECHANICAL EXPLOSION PROOF TYPE EXHAUST VENTILATION (2 VENTILATORS (EACH 50) FOR EACH HOLD), WITH RATE 6 AIR CHANGES PER HOUR.  -CO2 FITTED: ENGINE ROOM, EACH CARGO HOLD.  –LADDERS: AUSTRALIAN TYPE.  –STRENGTH OF THE TANK TOP:  NO.1- 16,7 TON/M2,  NO2.- 14 TON/M2,  NO.3- 19,35 TON/M2,  NO.4- 14,1 TON/M2,  NO.5- 18,3 TON/M2.    HEAVY CARGOES OF S.F. 12 CFT/LT (0.34 CBM/LT) IN HOLDS NOS. 1, 3 & 5 AND NOS.2 & 4 EMPTY SHALL BE LOADED AT FULL SCANTLING DRAFT AND HOLDS NOS. 2 & 4 SHALL BE DESIGNED FOR LOADING OF S.F. 35 CBF/LT.  5 HATCH COVERS: WEATHER TIGHT, ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC FORE & AFT FOLDING TYPE  OPERATED BY EXTERNAL HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS. HATCH COVES TOP STRENGTH: NO.1- 4,1 TON/M2; NO. 2~5- 3,5 TON/M2 HATCH COVER SIZE (LM X BM) ------------------------------- NO.1 16,00 X 18,40/13,70 NOS. 2~5 19,20 X 20,20   HATCH NO. & NOMINAL OPENING SIZE (LM X BM) -------- ------------------------------ NO.1     16.00 X 18.20/13.50 NOS. 2~5 19.20 X 20.20 CRANES: 4 X SWL 35 MT INSTALLED IN CENTER ON UPPER DECK BETWEEN EACH HOLDS. MAIN ENGINE: MAN-B&W 5S50MC-C MK7. MCR 10750 BHP(7900KW) X 127 RPM GENERATOR ENGINE: 3 X YANMAR 6EY18ALW X 600 KW X 900 RPM (440V, 60HZ) M/E & G/E FUEL OIL: -HFO RMG 380 CST/50 C IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010E WITH CALCULATED CARBON  AROMATICITY INDEX (C.C.A.I.) NOT EXCEEDS 850. THE FUEL SHALL BE FREE FROM INORGANIC ACIDS AND FROM USED LUBRICATING OILS. THE FUEL SHOULD NOT INCLUDE ANY ADDED SUBSTANCE OR CHEMICAL WASTE WHICH JEOPARDIZES THE SAFETY OF SHIPS OR ADVERSELY AFFECTS THE PERFORMANCE OF THE MACHINERY, ETC, IN ACCORDANCE WITH CLAUSE 5 OF THE ISO 8217:2010E WHERE AND WHEN IT APPLICABLE. -MGO(DMA), MDO/DMB IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010E WITH SULFUR CONTENT ACCORDING TO CURRENT SULFUR REGULATIONS IMO, EU, CALIFORNIA STATE AREAS AND VISCOSITY ABOVE 3 CST AT 40 DEGREES CELSIUS.  VESSEL’S SPEED/BUNKER CONSUMPTION: SEA SPEED (LADEN/BALLAST) ABOUT 13,0/13,5 KNOTS. DAILY FUEL OIL CONSUMPTION OF MAIN ENGINE:  20 MT/DAY PLUS 2.0 MT/DAY GE FOR MANEUVER: 550 KG/HR MGO(DMA), MDO/DMB - FOR PURPOSE OF RELIABLE ENGINE OPERATION AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH CURRENT SULFUR REGULATIONS IMO, EU, CALIFORNIA STATE AREAS.  THE ABOVE STATED SPEED AND BUNKER CONSUMPTION FIGURES AT SEA ARE STATED PROVIDED THE ABSENCE OF (ADVERSE) COMING CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, I.E. WHEN GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS - WIND MAXIMUM BEAUFORT FORCE 2 (UP TO 3.5 M/SEC), CALM (SWH UPTO 0.5 M) AND DEEP SEA AND PROVIDED VESSEL'S UNDERWATER HULL AND PROPELLER ARE CLEAN FROM FOULING.  VESSEL'S M/E BURNS MDO/DMB WHEN MANEUVERING IN/APPROACHES NARROW OR RESTRICTED WATERS INCLUDING CANALS/RIVERS/SHALLOW WATERS/FOG CONDITIONS AND ALSO WHEN ME/GE COLD START APPLICABLE. BUNKER CONSUMPTION IN PORT: IN PORT W/O CARGO OPERATIONS – 1.5 MT HFO 380 CST PER DAY PLUS BOILER CONSUMPTION: A) 1.0 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE ABOVE 15 DEG CELSIUS B) 1.2 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE FROM 0 AND UPTO 15 DEG CELSIUS C) 1.5 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE BELOW 0 DEG CELSIUS   IN PORT WITH CARGO OPERATIONS – 3.5 MT HFO 380 CST PER DAY PLUS BOILER CONSUMPTION: A) 1.0 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE ABOVE 15 DEG CELSIUS B) 1.2 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE FROM 0 AND UPTO 15 DEG CELSIUS C) 1.5 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE BELOW 0 DEG CELSIUS ADA WOG. OWNERS’ P&I CLUB: JAPAN P&I CLUB. H+M INSURANCE COMPANY: LLOYDS OF LONDON.   bb. MV DD VICTORY, DESCRIBED AS BELOW
 
FLAG: PANAMA,
 
PORT OF REGISTRY: PANAMA
 
BUILT: 4/2008/KOREA
 
OFFICIAL NO: 33871-08
 
IMO NO: 9357468
 
CALL SIGN: 3EPG5
 
TYPE OF VESSEL: SINGLE DECK BULK CARRIER
 
CLASSIFICATION SOCIETY: KOREAN REGISTER OF SHIPPING
 
CLASS NOTATION: +KRS-BULKCARRIER ESP, BC-A (HOLDS NO.2 AND 4 MAY BE EMPTY), IC,GRAB,CDG,CLEAN1,LG,LI,KRM1-UMA,BWE.
DWT 26,482 MT
 
LOA/LBP/BREADTH/DEPTH/DRAFT/TPC:159.00/151.09/27.00/14.00/9.921M/36.1MT
 
GRT/NRT: 17,136/8,917 MT
 
HOLDS/HATCHES: 5/5
 
TTL CAPACITY GRAIN / BALE: 1.220.285CBF (34.552CBM) / 1.159.270 CBF (32.825 CBM)
 
5 HOLDS (LENGTH X WIDTH), IN METERS
 
No.1: 22.40 X 16.00(fwd) - 26.40(aft)
No.2: 22.40 X 26.40
No.3: 24.00 X 26.40
No.4: 24.00 X 26.40
No.5: 22.40 X 26.40
 
FLAT FLOOR MEASUREMENT OF CARGO HOLDS AT TANK TOP (LENGTH X WIDTH), IN METERS
 
No.1:   19.25 x 4.81(fwd)-17.67(aft)
 
No.2:   20.00 x 19.20
 
No.3,4: 21.55 x 19.20
 
No.5:   22.40 x 19.20(fwd)-9.58(aft)
 
5 HATCHES (WEATHER TIGHT, HYDRAULIC FORE & AFT FOLDING TYPE OPERATED BY EXTERNAL HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS)
 
HATCH SIZE:
 
HATCH NO. NOMINAL OPENING SIZE (LM X BM)
 
NO.1         12.00 (L) X 14.40(B)
 
NOS.2~5     16.00 (L) X19.20(B)
 
CRANES: 4 X SWL 30 MT INSTALLED IN CENTER ON UPPER DECK BETWEEN EACH HOLDS.
 
OUTREACH (METRES) OF GEAR - 
 
A.  BEYOND SHIP’S RAIL 8.5
 
B.  BEYOND SHIP’S RAIL WITH MAXIMUM CARGO LIFT ON HOOK 8.5
 
SUPPLIED BY 4GRABS (RADIO OPERATED):
 
FILLING VOLUME (M3)    PILLED DENSITY (T/M3)    ADM. LIFTING CAPACITY/SWL(T)
 
V1=10,0            1,5                15,0
 
V2=8,0            1,8                14,4
 
V3=6,0            2,5                15,0
 
-CO2 FITTED.
 
-LOGS FITTED, BUT W/O STATIONARY STANCHIONS.
 
-LAKES FITTED -NO.
 
-LADDERS: AUSTRALIAN TYPE.
 
-STRENGTH OF THE TOP TANKS:
 
22 TONS/SQ.M FOR HOLDS NOS.1, 3&5
 
16 TONS/SQ.M FOR HOLDS NOS.2&4
 
-VESSEL HAS EXHAUST MECHANICAL VENTILATION IN THE HOLDS, WITH RATE 6 AIR CHANGES PER HOUR.
 
-MAIN ENGINE: B&W 6S42MC-MK7 6480 KWT X136RPM.
 
-GENERATOR ENGINE: 3 X YANMAR 6 NI8AL-UV X500KW
 
ASSUMPTION OF VESSEL'S SPEED/BUNKER CONSUMPTION:
 
SEA SPEED (LADEN/BALLAST)/ CONSUMPTION AT SEA (VLSFO 380CST):
12.7/13.2 KNOTS - 15.0 MT/DAY ME PLUS 2.0 MT/DAY GE;
M/E & G/E FUEL: VLSFO RMG 380 CST/50 C IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010E WITH 
CALCULATED CARBON AROMATICITY INDEX NOT MORE THAN 850. THE FUEL SHALL
BE FREE FROM INORGANIC ACIDS AND FROM USED LUBRICATING OILS.
THE FUEL SHOULD NOT INCLUDE ANY ADDED SUBSTANCE OR CHEMICAL WASTE WHICH
JEOPARDIZES THE SAFETY OF SHIPS OR ADVERSELY AFFECTS THE PERFORMANCE OF THE MACHINERY, ETC, IN ACCORDANCE WITH CLAUSE 5 OF THE ISO 8217:2010E.
FOR MANEUVER:500 KG/HRS MDO/DMA/DMB (IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010)- FOR PURPOSE OF RELIABLE ENGINE WORKING.
FOR INCINERATOR: 100 KG/DAY MDO/DMB (IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010E)
- FOR PURPOSE OF FUEL SLUDGE AND GARBAGE INCINERATION (MARPOL ANNEX VI).
THE ABOVE STATED SPEED AND BUNKER CONSUMPTION FIGURES AT SEA ARE STATED PROVIDED THE ABSENCE OF (ADVERSE) COMING CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, I.E. WHEN GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS - WIND MAXIMUM BEAUFORT FORCE 2 (UP TO 3.5 M/SEC), CALM (SWH UPTO 0.5 M) AND DEEP SEA AND PROVIDED VESSEL'S UNDERWATER HULL AND PROPELLER ARE CLEAN FROM FOULING. VESSEL'S M/E BURNS MDO/DMB WHEN MANEUVERING/APPROACHING NARROWS OR RESTRICTED WATERS INCLUDING 
CANALS/RIVERS/SHALLOW WATERS/STEAMING IN FOG CONDITIONS.
GENERATOR ENGINE CONSUMPTION IN PORT:
A) WITH CARGO OPERATIONS - 4.0 MT VLSFO 380 CST PER DAY
B) W/O CARGO OPERATIONS - 2.0 MT VLSFO 380 CST PER DAY
BOILER CONSUMPTION IN PORT OR WITHOUT MOTION:
A) 1.5 MT VLSFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE ABOVE 15 DEG CELSIUS
B) 2.0 MT VLSFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE FROM 0 AND UPTO 15 DEG CELSIUS
C) 2.5 MT VLSFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE BELOW 0 DEG CELSIUS
ADA WOG.
OWNERS P&I CLUB: JAPAN P&I CLUB
H+M INSURANCE COMPANY: LLOYD'S   Best regardsDD Shipping ltd, S.A.Chartering Dept.
